title: Introduction to Statistics for Educational Research and Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical concepts (mean, standard deviation, etc.) and high school-level mathematics proficiency
context.additional_context: Blended environment combining personalized feedback and small-group discussion sessions to supplement self-directed learning

learning_goals: Apply basic statistical techniques used in educational research (descriptive statistics, inferential statistics, hypothesis testing) to perform data analysis
Visualize and interpret real educational data using statistical software (R/Python, etc.)
Develop the ability to select appropriate statistical methods for research questions and report results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
